channel.title: gameDev on prostheticHead.dev
channel.description: Recent content in gameDev on prostheticHead.dev

item.title: Untitled Isoblockgame
item.description: Untitled IsoBlockGame The main project I’m working on at the moment is a game I have been making off and on for a few years now. I still don’t have an offical name for this game yet, at the moment the project name is isoblockgame. The Elevator Pitch because original ideas in gaming have never existed its best described as “Dwarf Fortress Like” in gameplay but much less complex. The graphical style I’m aiming for is old isometric sprite based games like Sim City 2000 and Transport Tycoon.
